name: Untitled Star Fox Minihack 2
storyline: General Pepper’s $19 Fortnite Card has been stolen by Andross! The Star Fox team is sent to retrieve it.
summary:
Sequel to Sunlit’s Untitled Star Fox Minihack.

One route, 6 Stages, mostly planets. I can’t speak for the difficulty, but if you can beat the original Star Fox, this shouldn’t be terrible. Also lots of added-in dialogue. It was fun to write that stuff.
